name: build-tools-cookbook
description: Simple recipes for building and compiling with the CLI.

scripts.img: mkdir -p dist/img && cp -r src/img/. dist/img && imageoptim dist/img
scripts.imgwin: cmd /c mkdir dist\img && cmd /c xcopy src\img\. dist\img /s /e /y && imageoptim --no-imageoptim dist/img
scripts.imglinux: mkdir -p dist/img && cp -r src/img/. dist/img && imageoptim --no-imageoptim dist/img
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run js && npm run css && npm run svg && npm run img && npm run copy
scripts.buildwin: cmd /c npm run cleanwin && npm run js && npm run css && npm run svg && npm run imgwin && npm run copywin
scripts.buildlinux: npm run clean && npm run js && npm run css && npm run svg && npm run imglinux && npm run copy
